definitions.definition: To have an effect on by using gentle or subtle action; to exert an influence upon; to modify, bias, or sway; to persuade or induce.
definitions.example: I must admit that this book influenced my outlook on life.

definitions.definition: To exert, make use of one's influence.
To cause to flow in or into; infuse; instill.
Subject to an effect caused by a person or thing outside of the subject's control.
